name: Sliding Edge
description:
Sliding Edge

You must prove yourself in a number of heists that you're worthy to join the "Hall of Thieves". You have to evade guards and pick doors in order to steal the gold. 

Complete all levels and you'll be inducted into the "Hall of Thieves".

Controls:
  • Space - skip story
  • Esc - settings
  • R - restart level
  • WASD  or arrow keys - Move
